author: cedricbritton.com
title: Hoverboard Techologies: How To Ride & First Impressions | Mashable Tech - CedricBritton.com
text:
It’s 2015 and like “Back to the Future” predicted Hoverboard is here (well, sorta). We got to test Hoverboard Technologies’ one wheeled Hoverboard-like device and it’s pretty cool. They are currently seeking funding via Kickstarter which ends on October 21, 2015 (yup, the “Back to the Future” date) to make founder Robert Bigler’s dream a reality.
Full review: http://on.mash.to/1LlABF4
